title: Opinions on nemesis draft?
body:
To me,its really bland. Nothing interesting about it. Just pick some champs for the enemy team and play a normal game on summoners rift,with like maybe a whole team of supports. 

But to me,game modes should be something new and exciting. Such as Ascension. An entire new map and an entire new mechanic. Maybe if it was Nemesis draft + ARAM or Nemesis draft + URF i would consider it being interesting but right now i dont feel its anything special

> But to me,game modes should be something new and exciting. Such as Ascension. An entire new map and an entire new mechanic. Maybe if it was Nemesis draft + ARAM or Nemesis draft + URF i would consider it being interesting but right now i dont feel its anything special

Combining game modes would be interesting, but I don't ever see it happening unfortunately

I reckon a cool idea for nemesis draft should be each team has to have 1 fighter/tank, 1 ap carry, 1 ad carry, and 1 support. So each team is relatively fair. The ap carry could be replaced for an assassin.

I don't think the problem with Nemesis Draft lies solely in it's simplicity (although I'm confident it would be infinitely more interesting as a modifier for other RGMs) but rather the way we, the players, decide what the enemy team will play. 

First off, it's not very controversial to say that people play to win in RGMs. Considering that, our attempts to screw over the enemy team begins with scouring the champ roster looking for the absolute worst picks to give the enemy and that often ends up being the support pool, as you mentioned, or outlier "weak" and undesirable champs (Yorick, Urgot, Galio etc). 

Since there's no way of stopping the enemy team screwing you over, even if you wanted to give them something interesting to play, the champ select devolves from potentially fun to tedious pretty quickly. In fact, I've seen people blame teammates for giving "strong" champs away which further highlights the pressure to not "mess up the picks". 

I love the concept but the way it turns out in game is less than ideal.

it'd be cool if it was added to a different mode.

Like Nemesis Draft Ascension. But on its own its kinda whatever. I can play a normal and click random if i wanna play crap.

They should release a deathmatch mode. Passively gen gold. Kills are worth 0 gold. First team to 100 kills wins.
